snippet.title: Klaus Lee: Thunderballs - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the announcement trailer for Klaus Lee: Thunderballs, an upcoming 2D action platformer game coming to Nintendo Switch and Windows PC and Mac via Steam in 2023. Check it out to see the game's level editor and more.

Taking the role of the titular mustached spelunker Klaus Lee, players will explore virtual worlds ranging from deep underground caverns to buried civilizations.
